reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Defense for Your Device!
reviews.reviewText: Some background: I'm a System Administrator and a handy man for many of my family members.TL;DR: Out of ALL screen protectors that I have tried on Amazon, Spigen has yet to fail me.I purchased the Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector for girlfriends iPhone 13 Pro, and it has the same results each time I have used their product, exceeded my expecations. She always on the go, so I needed a reliable screen protector that could withstand the rigors of daily life (2 hours public commute, gym, lawn mowing, etc.) and this one has proven to be a true champion.Installation Made Effortless: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The installation process was a breeze thanks to the included alignment guides and clear instructions. Within minutes, I had the screen protector perfectly aligned and securely adhered to her iPhone 13 Pro's screen. No annoying bubbles or misalignments to deal with - a hassle-free experience from start to finish.Rock-Solid Protection: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐She accidentally dropped her phone a few times since applying the Spigen protector, but to my amazement, her screen remained unscathed! This tempered glass screen protector offers top-notch protection against scratches and minor impacts, giving me peace of mind that her device is safe and sound.Note: It's not scratch proof. I have left my phone in a bag full of keys and screwdrivers and that is the only time it has been scratched.Crystal Clear and Responsive: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐The clarity of her screen has not been compromised in the slightest. The protector seamlessly integrates with her device's display. What's even better is that the touch sensitivity remains impeccable - no noticeable lag or difference in response time. It's like there's nothing between the screen and her fingertips.Fingerprint-Resistant Bonus: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I can't stress enough how much I appreciate the coating on this screen protector. Fingerprint smudges used to drive me crazy, but with this protector, they're almost non-existent. A quick wipe and her screen looks brand new again. It's the small details that really make a difference.Perfect Fit with Cases: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I was concerned that the screen protector might not play well with her favorite case, but my worries were unfounded. The Spigen protector is perfectly compatible with cases, and I've had no issues fitting her case over it. This attention to compatibility speaks volumes about the thoughtfulness of the design. She has a variety of cases from numerous sellers from name-brands to no-name-brands and they all fit without issue.In conclusion, the Spigen Tempered Glass Screen Protector is an absolute must-have for anyone who values their device's safety and performance. Its ease of installation, durability, and impressive display quality make it stand head and shoulders above other screen protectors I've tried. This product has earned my trust, along with my girlfriend's and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to fellow device users. Kudos to Spigen for delivering an outstanding screen protector!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best screen protector and customer service
reviews.reviewText: Don't go for any of the no name companies making this. This was a really fair price, quality was amazing, installation was amazing and customer service was amazing. I had a slight issue with one of my screens, so I contracted Spigen and they immediately sent me a new set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered and received quick and easy. Installed the glass very easily per the instructions, no bubbles. I was impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used zagg screen protectors for over 10 years. Recently they stopped sending the thing you put on your phone to help apply it perfectly. I found this and gave it a shot. It is so easy and fast. With zagg, I always had small bubbles no matter what I did. This one had 3 large bubbles right after applying. Then I used the included squeegee and all of them disappeared quickly. I haven’t dropped my phone to see how sturdy it, is but it seems to be holding up fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is by far the best screen protector I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: It's everything as advertised in the videos that are on the product description. It was easy to set up and install. Most of the bubbles were gone before I pulled the film cover off. And removing the remaining bubbles with the squeegee was simple. One did require using the cloth instead, but still easy. When putting on most screen protectors, lining up the glass to the exact correct position is usually difficult. But the alignment tray that comes with the kit makes it almost foul-proof. Very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install - No Bubbles
reviews.reviewText: This is the easiest to install screen protector you will find. I've tried many - Zagg, Otterbox, Belkin. This one installs air bubble-free every. single. time. All you have to do is follow the basic instructions.1. Turn off your phone (so you can see dirt more easily) then clean the screen with one of the provided wipes or some decent lens cleaner for glasses (this is better).2. Wipe the moisture from the cleaning wipe off with the cloth - which might (probably will) leave lint behind.3. Use the sticky to remove any dust, dander, hairs or lint. Be meticulous - it only takes about 15 seconds to do the entire screen.4. This is when you peel off the cover from the underside of the installation adapter. Doing it earlier can allow dust to settle on it before you can place it over the phone. The phone should be face up, the adapter goes over the top. It's a good fit and automatically has the screen protector in exactly the right place. It is impossible to get this wrong unless you put it on upside down (you won't - it says top with an arrow pointing to the top). When you've put it in place (you did remember to peel off the inside cover right? Otherwise you'll be cleaning and stickying again) in the middle of the install adapter there's a black strip that tells you to slide your finger up/down a few times - do this - hard. Wait 30 seconds. Remove that black strip then lift off the adapter. Peel off the last cover from your screen protector.Often there will be no bubbles after the install is done - but sometimes I found that a few (moisture bubbles) in random places under the screen protector. Use a cloth (not the stupidly hard slide they provide) to push these out to the edges, they are really easy to remove.That hard plastic slide they give you is apparently harder than screen protector glass and can scratch it if you're too enthusiastic. It's not the screen protector - I found it can scratch any protector from any manufacturer.No screen protector is perfect. All of them will scratch eventually (after all that's why you have it - so it gets scratched, not your phone). I've installed 10 of these for myself, family and friends. There is a reason these cost $15 not $25-$60. You get two kits, and you'll probably need both. Almost every time I installed these, one had a spec of dirt on the sticky side of the protector - before it got installed. Could it have gotten there because I was too slow installing it? Maybe. But it's too much of a coincidence. Happily it seems the second one is always clean. The thing is these protectors are the easiest to install - and if I follow those instructions above, at worst you might get a few moisture bubbles that are really easy to push out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple easy and works
reviews.reviewText: This is my 4th screen protector for various iPhones my family and I own or have owned. They do what they are suppose to do, they work! I will continue to buy these over any of the other low quality items on the market. Easy to install and lasting reliability

I have been using Spigen accessories for all my family’s screens for a long time and never had a problem, these products deliver every single time.The screen protector looks great, really easy to install on the phone, no air bubbles, at a decent price.Keep up the good work!

reviews.reviewTitle: Resistente e não atrapalha em nada
reviews.reviewText: Aplicação muito fácil, é impossível errar com o gabarito do kit. É vidro mesmo e passa muita confiança que vai proteger o aparelho de qualquer risco. Só achei ruim que não cobre toda a tela, tem um pequeno recuo da borda (acho que pra acomodar capinhas), mas usando a capinha da MESMA marca ainda fica um gap entre capa e película que acumula sujeira. Só por isso tiro 1 estrela (outro pequeno detalhe é que vem 2 unidades no kit... Podia vir só 1 e ser metade do preço... desconsiderando o frete)

Es el mejor cristal que he probado, la instalación es muy sencilla y en mi caso no quedó ninguna burbuja desde el primer intento de instalación, el paquete viene con dos cristales cada uno con su mecanismo de instalación propio, además de un kit que te ayuda a limpiar perfectamente bien tu equipo antes de la instalación del cristal.El tamaño es perfecto, cubre toda la pantalla, ojo, con pantalla me refiero a la parte del display no a todo el frontal de cristal del teléfono, este no se cubre por completo ya que deja suficiente espacio para que el cristal protector no interfiera con las diferentes cases que puedas usar, también deja al descubierto el notch y todos los sensores que ahí se encuentran por lo que no hay problema con que interfieran con el funcionamiento de dichos sensores.En cuanto a la calidad del cristal es muy buena, el cristal es muy claro aunque he notado que distorsiona un poco los colores al mirar la pantalla desde un ángulo muy inclinado, más que distorsionar los colores los apaga un poco, pero nada que moleste, además de que casi nunca vas a ver la pantalla de tu celular en esos ángulos, siento también que oscurece un poco la pantalla, pero es mínimo y tal vez solo sea mi percepción, por eso es que no lo pongo como algo negativo porque tal vez sea yo el que siente que el brillo no es igual que sin el cristal instalado, la sensibilidad del touch de la pantalla permanece idéntica, no noto alguna diferencia, lo que si noto y para mi es algo positivo es que el dedo resbala más fácilmente sobre este cristal que sobre la pantalla de mi iPhone, se siente muy bien.En cuánto durabilidad pues no puedo opinar nada porque no se me ha caído pero he leído muy buenas reseñas en cuanto a este punto. En conclusión el cristal de Spigen vale cada peso que se pague por él.

This tempered glass exceeded my expectations by providing excellent protection for my device's screen. The installation was easy, and its precise fit ensures full coverage without interfering with touch sensitivity. Its scratch-resistant surface effectively guards against daily wear and tear, maintaining the screen's clarity.

Ya los he comprado varias veces porque mi hijo es un destructor.Personalmente pienso que son de los mejores protectores de pantalla y el aplicador hace muy cómodo el ponerlo,el ponerlos bien y centrados.Aunque pienso también que son un poco caros.
